analysis.description:
KoreanLiberationDayToken._firstTokenId has external calls inside a loop:
	- this.ownerOf(tokenId) == _owner (/unique_contracts/0x2bfaabb24409b07854f4018ecf1c5cb136c7cf50.sol#356-360)

KoreanLiberationDayToken.tokensOfOwner has external calls inside a loop:
	- this.ownerOf(tokenId) == _owner (/unique_contracts/0x2bfaabb24409b07854f4018ecf1c5cb136c7cf50.sol#463-465)

KoreanLiberationDayToken.speechOfOwner has external calls inside a loop:
	- this.ownerOf(tokenId) == _owner (/unique_contracts/0x2bfaabb24409b07854f4018ecf1c5cb136c7cf50.sol)
